languages.text: "Если какая чернь посмеет непочтительность проявить — мы рядом. Усмирим".
"If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
languages.original_text: "Если какая чернь посмеет непочтительность проявить — мы рядом. Усмирим".

traits.locale_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
"If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
"If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
"If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
"If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

languages.text: «Como a esta morralla se le ocurra faltarle al respeto, los pondremos en su sitio en un santiamén».
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

traits.locale_text: «Como a esta morralla se le ocurra faltarle al respeto, los pondremos en su sitio en un santiamén».

languages.text: 「もし暴徒が無礼を働くようなら、我々はここで準備が出来ています。奴らをやっつけます」
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

traits.locale_text: 「もし暴徒が無礼を働くようなら、我々はここで準備が出来ています。奴らをやっつけます」

languages.text: “如果有哪个混蛋敢不尊重您的话，我们会立刻动手，把那个家伙立刻解决掉。”
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

traits.locale_text: “如果有哪个混蛋敢不尊重您的话，我们会立刻动手，把那个家伙立刻解决掉。”

languages.text: "Sollte sich das Gesindel als respektlos erweisen, stehen wir bereit. Wir haben alles im Griff."
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

traits.locale_text: "Sollte sich das Gesindel als respektlos erweisen, stehen wir bereit. Wir haben alles im Griff."

languages.text: « Si la vermine fait montre de la moindre insolence, nous interviendrons sur-le-champ. »
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."

traits.locale_text: « Si la vermine fait montre de la moindre insolence, nous interviendrons sur-le-champ. »

languages.text: "Ayaktakımından herhangi biri saygısızlığa cüret ederse tam burada olacağız. Onlarla ilgileniriz."
languages.original_text: "If any of the rabble dare to show any disrespect, we'll be right here. We'll put them down."
